header.title: math

description.p: This module provides an interface to a number of mathematical functions.

note.p: Not all functions are provided on all platforms. In particular, the erf/1 and erfc/1 functions are not provided on Windows.

desc.p: A collection of mathematical functions that return floats. Arguments are numbers.
Returns the error function of X, where:
desc.pre: erf(X) = 2/sqrt(pi)*integral from 0 to X of exp(-t*t) dt.

desc.p: erfc(X) returns 1.0 - erf(X), computed by methods that avoid cancellation for large X.

section.title: Limitations
section.p: As these are the C library, the same limitations apply.
